headline: Premarket Movers: Palantir Still Running on Venezuela Operation
summary: Palantir (NASDAQ: PLTR), whose data analytics software is used by government defense and intelligence operations, is on the move again. For one, Truist upgraded PLTR to a buy rating. The firm noted that “GenAI adoption could ‘compress the market impact’ of the last four decades of enterprise technology into just the next five to ten years,” ...
